EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont™ RoHS Compliant Letters- Kevlar®, Nomex® and Nomex® Paper
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.Salutation} {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName},
Thank you for your interest in DuPont Kevlar® and Nomex®.
Attached are the RoHs Letters that you requested.
If you have additional questions, please contact the person on the letters.
DuPont Protection Solutions
